title: Does the original'security' come back from the word '40 days' in Italian?
subtitle: "Sanitary quarantine" separates and restricts the movement of people who have been exposed to infectious disease to see whether they will become infected.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The word "sanitary stone" stems from the Italian word "forty," which represents the number of days when persons likely to be exposed to infectious diseases must remain isolated.
